# [Interview #1038: Steelheart Signing Report - Argent, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1038#7)

#### Question

How do you spell "Lyss" the woman Jasnah meets with in the
*Words of Radiance*
prologue?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Not sure, but I think it's L-y-s-s.

#### Footnote

In
*Words of Radiance*
it is actually spelled "Liss".
